name: Christian Fashion
overview:
Incorporated in the year 2012, at New Delhi (India), we “Christian Fashion”, are occupied in manufacturing, supplying and providing service premium quality range of Bridal Gowns, Evening Gowns, Bridal Headdresses Floral, Bridal Wedding Gloves, etc.

Projects: Wedding Gowns With Sleeves Designer Bridal Gowns Plus Size Wedding Gowns Elie Saab Wedding Gowns Bridal Gowns Pronovias Wedding Gowns Ball Gown Wedding Gowns Imported Laces Bridal Gowns Evening Gowns

Our Quality Assurance: Quality is an important part of our organization which helps us gain an edge over our competitors. Taking this into consideration, our diligent team is devoted in offering optimum quality products to our clients.

Client Satisfaction: Owing to our meticulous efforts, we have established strong position in the market. Backed by skilled and experienced craftsmen, we are able to design our wide range of products in accordance with client specifications.

Our Team: We are blessed with a team of dedicated professionals, who are well-versed with all the procedures and techniques of fabricating of our offered products in timely manner.

Our Infrastructure: To fabricate finest quality range of Bridal Gowns, Evening Gowns, Bridal Headdresses Floral, Bridal Weeding Gloves, etc., we have established an efficient infrastructure. This unit is prepared with the newest technology and all essential machinery to match the international quality parameters.

Research & Development: We have a separate Research & Development wing, which is well equipped with the modern facilities that ensures overall development of the product and as per the emerging market trends. This unit also assist us to add new features to the existing products for enhancing the functionality of our range at client”s end.
